snippet: The author of “The Way the World Works” suspects Shakespeare is the most overrated writer of all time. “Although I must say his sonnets are incredible.”
abstract: By the Book interview with The Way the World Works author Nicholson Baker, who contends that Shakespeare is the most overrated author of all time.
lead_paragraph: The author of “The Way the World Works” suspects Shakespeare is the most overrated writer of all time. “Although I must say his sonnets are incredible.”
